column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Chicago is known for their deep dish pizzas
column3: my expectations were pretttty high. Unfortunately
column4: the first place we went to
column5: (which was one of the top places a lot of people recommend)
column6: was a bit disappointing to me. But that is besides the point here. Lou Malnati's was the last place we tried
column7: and it turned out to be pretttty good! The crust was perfectly crunchy and ohhh the cheese! Very yummy. The waiter was very kind
column8: which is always a plus. They also have frozen pizzas that you can purchase.
